pullRequest.title: Context.with/get, AttributesBuilder/LabelsBuilder.set
pullRequest.bodyText:
A context can only have values, attributesbuilder can only have attributes, labelsbuilder can only have labels, so this reduces some repetition in user code.
Fixes #1825

nodes.bodyText: @jkwatson Any reason to use addAll before? Couldn't think of one so made this symmetrical with above
